CustomField.description: American Express (AMEX) -AMEX's code is a four-digit number on the front of the card above the credit card number. Visa - Visa's Card Verification Value (CVV) and MasterCard's Validation Code (CVC) are three-digit numbers on the back of the card.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: American Express (AMEX) -AMEX's code is a four-digit number on the front of the card above the credit card number. Visa - Visa's Card Verification Value (CVV) and MasterCard's Validation Code (CVC) are three-digit numbers on the back of the card.
CustomField.label: DEPRECATED: Credit Card Validation Code
